history.content:
To run a PCR testing experiment with 3 thermocycling cycles and to seal the plate for 20 minutes at 175 degrees Celsius, you will need to first prepare the PCR liquid using the materials you have listed. Here is a step-by-step plan for preparing the PCR liquid and setting up the experiment:

1. Label the final plate for all materials, ensuring it is organized for easy tracking.
2. In the empty tube, combine the following components to make the Master Mix:
   - Add 1 mL of 5x Reaction Buffer.
   - Add 40 uL of DNA Polymerase.
   - Add 200 uL of DNTPs.
   - Add 1 mL of GC Enhancer.
   - Add 10 mL of Biowater.
3. Mix the Master Mix thoroughly by gently vortexing or pipetting up and down to ensure proper homogenization.
4. Add 20 uL of Forward Primers, 20 uL of Reverse Primers, and 20 uL of Template DNA strands to individual wells of the final plate, according to your experimental design.
5. Add an appropriate volume of the Master Mix to each well containing the primers and template DNA, ensuring thorough mixing.
6. Seal the final plate to prevent evaporation during PCR cycling.
7. Place the sealed plate in the thermocycler and run the PCR program with 3 thermocycling cycles as per your experimental design.
8. After completing the thermocycling cycles, remove the plate and proceed with sealing it for incubation at 175 degrees Celsius for 20 minutes.
9. Allow the plate to cool down before further analysis or storage.

#####

```yaml
workflow:
  ids:
    - - cp_wf_trashplate
      - cp_wf_newplate
  distances:
    - - 1.771034836769104
      - 1.7809419631958008
  metadatas:
    - - experiment_info: Plate removal workflow for the RPL Color Picker
    - - experiment_info: New Plate workflow for the RPL Color Picker
  embeddings: null
  documents:
    - - '{"name": "Color Picker - Trash Plate - Workflow", "metadata": {"author": "<INSERT AUTHOR>", "info": "Plate removal workflow for the RPL Color Picker", "version": 0.1}, "modules": [{"name": "pf400"}, {"name": "barty"}], "flowdef": [{"name": "Move to final location", "module": "pf400", "action": "transfer", "args": {"source": "camera_module.plate_station", "target": "wc.trash", "source_plate_rotation": "narrow", "target_plate_rotation": "narrow"}}, {"name": "Drain Max Ink", "module": "barty", "action": "drain_ink_all_motors", "args": {"foo": "bar"}, "comments": "Drain OT2 of max vol of ink."}]}'
    - - '{"name": "Color Picker - New Plate - Workflow", "metadata": {"author": "<INSERT AUTHOR>", "info": "New Plate workflow for the RPL Color Picker", "version": 0.1}, "modules": [{"name": "sciclops"}, {"name": "pf400"}], "flowdef": [{"name": "Color Plate to Plate Exchange", "module": "sciclops", "action": "get_plate", "args": {"pos": "tower1", "target": "sciclops.exchange"}, "comments": "Move initial color plate from sciclops to plate exchange"}, {"name": "Move to final location", "module": "pf400", "action": "transfer", "args": {"source": "sciclops.exchange", "target": "camera_module.plate_station", "source_plate_rotation": "narrow", "target_plate_rotation": "narrow"}}]}'
  uris: null
  data: null
```
